title: Course Class Missing Issue Investigation
details:
User reported missing course and class metadata when processing a PDF with na pdf-notes command.

Source PDF path: C:\Users\danshue.REDMOND\OneDrive\Education\MBA-Resources\Value Chain Management\Operations Management\operations-management-quality-and-supply-chain\Case Studies\The Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company - The Quest for Service Excellence.pdf

Generated markdown path: C:\Users\danshue.REDMOND\Vault\01_Projects\MBA\Value Chain Management\Operations Management\operations-management-quality-and-supply-chain\Case Studies\The Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company - The Quest for Service Excellence.md

Issue: Course and class fields in metadata are empty strings:
course: ''
class: ''

But program is correctly extracted as "Value Chain Management"

The hierarchy in the output path should be:
Level 1 (Program): Value Chain Management  
Level 2 (Course): Operations Management
Level 3 (Class): operations-management-quality-and-supply-chain

Need to investigate why MetadataHierarchyDetector is not extracting course and class from the vault path hierarchy.
